sentences.en: A cup of coffee will soon perk you up.
sentences.cn: 你喝一杯咖啡马上精神会振作起来.

sentences.en: A shower would soon perk you up.
sentences.cn: 冲个淋浴你很快就会打起精神的.

sentences.en: After flirting with Chandler, she leaves Central Perk without the cookie.
sentences.cn: 但与钱德调情之后, 她显然意乱情迷,忘了饼干就出门了.

sentences.en: Anything that could save the company money and perk up its cash flow was examined.
sentences.cn: 所有能够为公司节省开支、增加流动资金的办法都研究过了。

sentences.en: He was offered a company car as a perk.
sentences.cn: 他得到了一辆公司的汽车作为特殊待遇.

sentences.en: House prices are expected to perk up.
House prices could perk up during the autumn.
I need a stiff drink to perk me up!
sentences.cn: 我需要喝点酒来提一提神.

sentences.en: I only eat here because it’s free – one of the perks of the job.
sentences.cn: 我在这里吃饭只是因为不用花钱——这份工作的额外好处之一。

sentences.en: Maybe if I wet my whistle, I'll perk up.
sentences.cn: 如果我喝点酒, 也许就来精神了.

sentences.en: New furniture and paint perked up the room.
sentences.cn: 新家具和涂料使房间焕然一新

sentences.en: On closer inspection , however, the economy is starting to perk up.
sentences.cn: 进一步观察, 中国经济开始振作.

sentences.en: Perk up a dark kitchen with a coat of paint.
sentences.cn: 把昏暗的廚房油漆一下使它更亮堂.

sentences.en: Psychological twists perk up an otherwise predictable story line.
sentences.cn: 心理转折使原本老套的故事情节变得生动有趣。

sentences.en: The biggest star perk, and the biggest power trip, must be the private plane.
sentences.cn: 顶级的明星待遇和无上的权力体验肯定要数私人飞机了。

sentences.en: Well , if they didn't perk up, they'd be having their butcher soon.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 他们要是再不拿出点劲儿来,凶神恶煞也很快就要来叫他们尝尝味道了.

sentences.en: You need a bright red scarf to perk up that grey suit.
sentences.cn: 你围上一条大红围巾能显得那套灰西装更漂亮.

trans.tran_en: something that you get legally from your work in addition to your wages, such as goods, meals, or a car

trans.tran_cn: 恢复， 振作； 打扮； 竖起
